markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Martial Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2946) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 75 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Magus](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=95)

**Prerequisites**
[Magus Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2945)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [magus feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=389) of your choice.

<title level="2">Basic Martial Magic leads to...</title>
[Advanced Martial Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2949)
name: Basic Martial Magic
